lines.text: Sorry, Candy. I adore you, I really do. It's just that I prefer my women with a penis.

[Crawford is showing off a new outfit]
Just something I threw together. I call it... Braveheart meets Liberace-Bravache!
Hey, Scottish. From my salon, right?
Still looking for a job, eh?
Hey, I tell you what. Next month, it's loser's day! You come back and I piss on your head!
